sense.def:
Z izrazom
from
povemo, kakšno je poreklo, vir ali začetek nečesa.

seg.quote: ...wisps of smoke from a small fire.
She came from Ilford.
Get the leaflet from a post office.
...a song from his latest film.
The shafts were cut from heavy planks of wood.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
moves or is taken from a place
, zapusti neki kraj ali je odstranjen, tako da ga ni več tam.

seg.quote: They drove down from Leeds.
We scrambled from our trucks and ran after them.
We went around clearing rubbish from the fields.

sense.def:
To take something from an amount
pomeni za določeni znesek zmanjšati neko vsoto.

seg.quote: This will be deducted from your pension.

sense.def:
To be away from a place
pomeni ne biti na nekem kraju.

seg.quote: They were away from home.

sense.def:
To return from doing something
pomeni vrniti se, potem ko smo nekaj naredili.

seg.quote: The men had not yet come back from fishing.

sense.def:
To see or hear something from a particular position
pomeni biti v določenem položaju, v katerem nekaj vidimo ali slišimo.

seg.quote: From the top of the bus you could look down on people below.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
sticks out or hangs from an object
, je pritrjeno na neki predmet ali se ga dotika.

seg.quote: ...buckets hanging from a bamboo pole.

sense.def:
Izraz
from
uporabimo, ko govorimo o razdaljah. Na primer, če je neki kraj
fifty miles from another
, je razdalja med dvema krajema petdeset milj.

Kadar gre cesta
from one place to another
, po njej lahko potujemo med dvema krajema.

seg.quote: ...on the main road from Paris to Marseilles.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
happens from a particular time
, se začne dogajati ob določenem času.

seg.quote: She was deaf from birth.
We had no rain from March to October.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
changes from one thing to another
, preneha biti prvo in postane nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: They enlarged the committee from 17 members to 30.
...translating from one language to another.

sense.def:
Kadar neka stvar
happens from another
, je druga stvar vzrok za prvo.

seg.quote: From nervousness she said a few more stupid things.
My eyes hurt from the wind.

sense.def:
Izraz
from
uporabimo, kadar povemo razlog za neko mnenje.

seg.quote: I could see from her face that she felt disappointed.
I am speaking from personal experience.

sense.def:
From one thing to another
rečemo, kadar navajamo razpon možnih stvari.

seg.quote: The process takes from two to five weeks.
The flowers may be anything from pink to crimson.
